#summary Returns information about scenes matching specified criteria.
#labels Protocol-Grid

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetScenes||String||Yes||
||`NameQuery`||String to match against scene names||String||Optional^1^||
||`MinPosition`||Bottom southwest corner of the bounding box to search for scenes inside of||Vector3d||Optional^1^||
||`MaxPosition`||Top northeast corner of the bounding box to search for scenes inside of||Vector3d||Optional^1^||
||`Enabled`||If True, only Enabled scenes will be searched||Boolean||Optional, defaults to False||
||`MaxNumber`||Maximum number of results to return||Integer||Optional||

  * ^1^Either `NameQuery` or both `MinPosition` and `MaxPosition` must be specified

{{{
RequestMethod=GetScenes
&NameQuery=Test
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if scene information was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Scenes`||Array of scenes that matched the query||Array, see below||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

== Scene Information Format ==

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`SceneID`||UUID of the scene||UUID||
||`Name`||Scene name||String||
||`Enabled`||True if the scene is online and able to receive communication||Boolean||
||`MinPosition`||Bottom southwest corner of the scene's bounding box||Vector3d||
||`MaxPosition`||Top northeast corner of the scene's bounding box||Vector3d||
||`Address`||URL that is used for service communication with the scene||Uri||
||`ExtraData`||Free form JSON data associated with the scene||JSON||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
    "Scenes":
    [
        {
            "SceneID":"efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0",
            "Name":"Test Scene",
            "Enabled":true,
            "MinPosition":[256, 256, 25],
            "MaxPosition":[512, 512, 50],
            "Address":"http://simulator.example.com:12035/scenes/Test%20Scene",
            "ExtraData":{}
        }
    ]
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"Invalid bounding box"
}
}}}
